title: Welcome to the Typography Guide
excerpt: Compare the thumbnails below. Which one catches your eye?
content: You probably said the left one haven't you? So can you tell how much typography can make UI look sooo much better! Here we will talk more about how You can make UI's 10x better.

excerpt: Let me show how this works.

content.text: you can make text look a lot better.

content: Stay tuned for more tips and tricks on typography!
